text: Aŵala ŵaakunkumbuchilaga Allah (pakunkolanga) chiimile, chitamile kwisa soni (ali chigonele) cha mu mbalati mwao, ni akuchetelelaga mu kagumbidwe ka mawunde ni mataka, (ni akutiji): “Ambuje ŵetu! Nganin'gamba gumba yalakweyi mwa masanje, kuswejela ni Kwenu, basi tuŵambasyani ku ilagasyo ya Moto.”
